ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda

Class RdaVm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Vm
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVm
        • ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.RdaVm

  • public class RdaVm
extends org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVm
    The RdaVm particularly supports multiple resources. The central method updateVmProcessing() had to be extended to support the bandwidth and storage I/O, besides CPU speed. Moreover, some methods had also to be adapted to support decimal places for RAM and network bandwidth.
    Author:
    Patrick A. Taddei

    • Method Detail

      • updateVmProcessing

        public double updateVmProcessing(double currentTime,
                        List<Double> mipsShare,
                        double bwShare,
                        double storageShare)
        Updates the processing of cloudlets running on this VM.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - current simulation time
        mipsShare - array with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler
        Returns:
        time predicted completion time of the earliest finishing cloudlet, or 0 if there is no next events
